name: Guardian Cruiser
description: Cruiser ship of AXIS Faction that have a Alien and Plasma resistance. It gives harmonic Shield bonus that boost the shield of the fleet when equip. It has 4 weapons slots, 5 armor slots in mk1 and 6 armor slot in mk2-mk6
obtaining: You can obtain its blueprint by attacking Axis Reaper Cargo in Axis sector
tips-builds: I advise you to use xeno pulse cannon. Use diffuser shield in farming or Metaphase shield in Fvf. Dont use Xenophase shield it will take longer to repair
author: Tsun-Devil Sonanochi
